data.actual_result: there is point hand cursor if you hover it around the game icon. you cant open the game info if you attempt to click it.
data.expected_result: it should stay as crossed circle cursor
data.short_description: you can see the point hand cursor in the quick launcher while the game is running
data.steps_to_repro: - launch a game from quick launcher - after launching the game, hover your mouse in the running game. click of you see the point hand icon
